title: Chosen Darkness
description: Would you choose Darkness for the greater good? Would you give up your one chance of happiness to follow what seems to be your destiny? This is the decision Falyn has to make and she certainly doesn't feel like she was ever cut out to be selfless and heroic. When nineteen-year-old lone werewolf Falyn teams up with bounty hunter Alex Rave, a sexy vampire, her life will never be the same. During their journey together, which takes them from the human world to the world of the immortals and back, the unique power locked inside her puts Falyn in danger and Alex on his guard. Her choices are about to lead her into Darkness and Alex will be her only way back.
author: Fawn Atondo
